document_data.mainbody:
eece was a halfling girl that lived in Phlan that worked at Madame Freonas Tea Kettle during the late 15 century DR. She was one of five daughters the restaurants owner, Madame Freona.
Reece had ginger curly hair. She was not quite yet considered an adult as of the 1480s DR.
Reeces other sisters included Blaizette, Briez, Grelinda, and Whittlee.
